item.description:
Join us for a fun afternoon helping during the live, televised grand finale of the 46th Annual WGBH Auction!


Our Meet Up group will be helping as bid takers. We will be volunteering from 2-6:00pm. You must be able to attend the entire volunteer session. There will be volunteer training from 2-3pm, then our shift starts at 2pm.  Parking will be validated for volunteers at the big lot next door to the WGBH building. Volunteers will also receive a complimentary annual WGBH membership.

 

IMPORTANT: When you sign up on Meet Up to volunteer, you must also email Jaime Reese at WGBH with your full name and email address. Her email is: jaime_reese@wgbh.org

Bid-taker Position Description:

Bid-takers (25 positions available per shift) help to catalog bids from our viewers when they call into the studio. This year bids again will be taken via computer, which we'll provide training in at the beginning of each shift.     

Responsibilities

  • Attend volunteer training (during the first hour of your volunteer shift)
  • Answer incoming calls from WGBH supporters, using a basic script
  • Enter information into a computer database


Qualifications  

  • Ability to speak loudly and clearly over the telephone
  • Ability to hear callers over the telephone with ease
  • Familiarity with using a laptop computer
  • Experience with basic data entry  
  • You must be available for the entire shift in order to volunteer. WGBH is unable to accommodate late arrivals and/or early departures.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside lobby or ask at the front desk for the volunteer training. If you have trouble finding us call, 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a fun and unique afternoon volunteering at WGBH's annual televised live fundraiser auction. Support a great cause!
